artist: Manufacturer: Minton, Hollins & Co., Stoke-on-Trent, Staffordshire, England
description: pea-green glaze over high relief carving of a woman's head in profile; flower on L, thistle on R; "SCOT", incorporated into design
inscription: \"MINTON, HOLLINS & CO./STOKE-ON-TRENT\", stamped, on bottom; illegible pencil marks, on bottom
object_name: Tile with profile of a woman
title: Scot
